=====================================
Change log for gocept.recordserialize
=====================================

1.0 (2017-12-06)
================

- Add support for `setuptools >= 32`.

- Drop support for Python 2.6.


0.3 (2016-02-29)
================

- Escape unicode characters on errors.


0.2 (2013-11-26)
================

- Fixed dependency on setuptools.


0.1 (2012-09-19)
================

initial release
